channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- .NET Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- .NET Core

item.title: CVE-2018-8416|2024-08-05T06:54:36.382Z -- microsoft -- .net%20core
item.description: A tampering vulnerability exists when .NET Core improperly handles specially crafted files, aka ".NET Core Tampering Vulnerability." This affects .NET Core 2.1.
